issue.title: clean drill-module.conf file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-527](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-527). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
java memory module has a drill-module.conf file which was left over when code was extracted from Apache Drill.

This file is useless for the Arrow project as it doesn't require configuration file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-527?focusedCommentId=15852984) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 318
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/318>
